page.title: 19DAY IN THE LIFE OF: A PUPIL
page.content: After being forced to rise at 7am, I quickly perform all the necessary actions (breakfast etc.). That done, I set off at around 8.15. Reaching school at 8.45, I rush to the form room for registration. At 9.10 lessons start, today's being {Geography.}A quick break from 10.20 to 10.40, is allowed before setting off to the English department for an enthralling lesson of{Literature.}35 minutes later sees me making my way to Maths. After slaving away for the next half-hour, the bell rings, signalling Chemistry, which usually means I've fogotten to bring in my Homework. at 1.05, the bell again rings for lunch, during which I will go into town. Registration is once more called at 2.05. Ten minutes later I am due for Computer Studies, which will keep me busy until 3.25, the final bell ring.
